sn46.54:12.9: This is explained in the Mahāprajñāpāramitāśāstra as meaning that its highest potential is rebirth as one of the gods of universal beauty (_subhakiṇha_). https://discourse.suttacentral.net/t/subha-not-explained-properly-in-commentaries-but-explained-in-maha-prajna-paramita-shastra/35077/3      https://www.wisdomlib.org/buddhism/book/maha-prajnaparamita-sastra/d/doc225609.html#note-t-55063
